attributes.comment:
$905 for an I-485 Application?! Are you kidding! First prove that you can be
efficient and then we will talk.
Not everyone files for an I-765 and I-131. You say so yourselves when you explain
your flawed and deceiving math. However, now you want to charge everyone $905
whether one files an I-131 or not?! This does not make sense! And all this would
only improve the wait times by two months?! No thanks!

All you are doing is discouraging immigrants to use the legal ways to come and
work in this country and instead you are encouraging the illegal immigration. You
will increase the number of people staying in the shadows. How can this help
improve National Security?!
Not all immigrants work for tech companies; most work the fields and the
dishwasher at your favorite restaurant. They barely push minimum wage. Just put
yourselves in their shoes for a minute, and think?..

USCIS is a government agency and as such should receive some government
money. If not, privatize it. How about this, switch some of my tax money from
paying for the war in Iraq, to funding USCIS!

As an American Citizen, I strongly disagree to the extent of this fee adjustment!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
